lines.text:
[after hitting a particularly deep pothole]
Sorry, Miss Jan.
Sam, I think by now you'd know every hole in this road.
I know all the holes, Miss Jan, but on this road there's no place to go but in them.
Do I look like I'm afraid of zombies?
I may be a dumb diver but I got an A in arithmetic at PS-81... that's in New York.
